CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(copado__Org_Type__c, 'Scratch Org'),ISPICKVAL(copado__Org_Type__c, 'Scratch Org - Test Only')), IMAGE('/resource/1516617624000/'+IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '')+'DXType?isdtp=p1', 'Salesforce DX Scratch Org', 40, 40), IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(copado__Org_Type__c, 'Production/Developer'), copado__is_Developer_Hub_Org__c == FALSE), IMAGE('/resource/1516617528000/'+IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '')+'sforce?isdtp=p1', 'Production/Developer', 40, 50), IF( ISPICKVAL(copado__Org_Type__c, 'Sandbox'), IMAGE('/resource/1516617549000/'+IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '')+'sandbox?isdtp=p1', 'Sandbox', 40, 40), IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(copado__Org_Type__c, 'Production/Developer'), copado__is_Developer_Hub_Org__c == TRUE), IMAGE('/resource/1516617568000/'+IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '')+'Hub?isdtp=p1', 'DX Developer Hub', 40, 40), 'Unknown Org Type' )
) ) )
CustomField.label: Type Icon
